entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Revisit FileTextLoaderOptions.FileLengthThreshold #58553
  • Move InlineHints service OOP #58551
  • Make Extract Method command handler async and move Extract Method service OOP #58550

PullRequests

Created

  • Experimental API idea for incremental generators #58554
    Area-Compilers
  • Inline hints options refactoring #58552
    Area-IDE
  • Extract method options refactoring #58549
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage

Merged

  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #58548
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58547
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #58546
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/required-members #58545
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #58544
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add truly synchronous indentation service interface for F# #57600
    Area-IDE
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE
  • Remove OptionSet and Workspace from TypeScript and F# Inline Rename interfaces #58381
    Area-IDE
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • Add CompilerGeneratedAttribute to record members #58542
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Records
  • Add IL verification with ILVerify in addition to PEVerify #37994
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog
